data.title: Joke Silva celebrates husband, Olu Jacobs at 82
data.meta_description: Veteran Nollywood actor, Olu Jacobs is 82 today
data.text:
Veteran Nollywood actor, Olu Jacobs is 82 today

And his wife Joke Silva took to her Instagram page to celebrate her man on his special day.

Sharing a video collage that featured Olu Jacobs at different points in his prime, she wrote;
